roleset.name: make sure the rules are followed

example.name: normal usage
example.text: Japan-1 agreed *trace*-1 to enforce a decision by an international wildlife conference to ban all trade in ivory, a spokesman for the Ministry of International Trade and Industry said.
example.arg: a decision by an international wildlife conference to ban all trade in ivory,

example.name: um, wrong word
example.text: The pilot union said the flight attendants' decision ``enforces our belief that an all-employee owned airline is practical and achievable.''
example.arg: our belief that an all-employee owned airline is practical and achievable.''

roleset.note: ENFORCE-V NOTES: I think they wanted 'reinforce,' which actually is related. (from enforce.01-v)
